name: execute_prompt
description: Execute a prompt by name with optional input. Returns the formatted prompt text ready for use with AI models.

name.description: Name of the prompt to execute. Must match an existing prompt name.

input.description: Optional input text to be processed with the prompt. Will be appended to the prompt text.
